name: r-jquerylib
description:
Obtain 'jQuery' as an HTML Dependency Object. Obtain any major version
of 'jQuery' (<https://code.jquery.com/>) and use it in any webpage
generated by 'htmltools' (e.g. 'shiny', 'htmlwidgets', and 'rmarkdown').
Most R users don't need to use this package directly, but other R
packages (e.g. 'shiny', 'rmarkdown', etc.) depend on this package to
avoid bundling redundant copies of 'jQuery'.

dependencies.name: r
dependencies.description:
R is 'GNU S', a freely available language and environment for
statistical computing and graphics which provides a wide variety of
statistical and graphical techniques: linear and nonlinear modelling,
statistical tests, time series analysis, classification, clustering,
etc. Please consult the R project homepage for further information.

dependencies.name: r-htmltools
dependencies.description: Tools for HTML. Tools for HTML generation and output.

dependent_to.name: r-bslib
dependent_to.description:
Custom 'Bootstrap' 'Sass' Themes for 'shiny' and 'rmarkdown'. Simplifies
custom 'CSS' styling of both 'shiny' and 'rmarkdown' via 'Bootstrap'
'Sass'. Supports both 'Bootstrap' 3 and 4 as well as their various
'Bootswatch' themes. An interactive widget is also provided for
previewing themes in real time.

dependent_to.name: r-dt
dependent_to.description:
A Wrapper of the JavaScript Library 'DataTables'. Data objects in R can
be rendered as HTML tables using the JavaScript library 'DataTables'
(typically via R Markdown or Shiny). The 'DataTables' library has been
included in this R package. The package name 'DT' is an abbreviation of
'DataTables'.

dependent_to.name: r-bookdown
dependent_to.description:
Authoring Books and Technical Documents with R Markdown. Output formats
and utilities for authoring books and technical documents with R
Markdown.

dependent_to.name: r-rmarkdown
dependent_to.description:
Dynamic Documents for R. Convert R Markdown documents into a variety of
formats.
